name: Outlanders of the Wasteland
description:
An RPG Platformer Side-Scrolling game with puzzles, exploring the wasteland of a post-apocalyptic setting together with an unknown child that you can switch characters with.

The Players fight their way in order to solve puzzles and kill mobs and bosses in a 10 minute exploration game. Make your way to the end of the game using different consumables perks that will help you in your journey!

Arjay Diocton - Project Manager, Level Designer 

Adrian Berbano - Lead Programmer,  Gameplay Programmer, QA

Swane Neron - 2D Artist, UX/UI Designer
